pages.text: $(thing)Boiling Cauldrons$() are used to boil recipes in bulk.$(br2)Similar to pot recipes, add fluids and items in the correct ratio and place over a heat source to boil.$(br2)For example: 1 dye and 1000mB water make 1000mB dye solution, just as adding 2 dye and 2000mB water makes 2000mB dye solution.
